About me

I am a passionate aspiring front end developer who possesses a good understanding of the core fundamental skills: HTML, CSS and JavaScript and who is aiming to develop and grow in the tech field.

History

I lived my childhood in a small and quite city. Next important moment was moving and living in United States for a period of 10 months where I experienced the touch of a new culture. For the past 2 years I lived in London a very divers city and I swtiched my attention into the tech field.

Academic status

I am currently in my second year undergoing a Bsc Human Nutrition course. I am doing this for personal interest as nutrition is an important aspect in my life. During this course I gained many academic skills but most importantly I improved my time-management. Working full time and studying in the same time was a bit of a challenge.
